scenario_text.value:
I feel so nervous. Who knows what could
happen at any time.
Right. Stay on your guard.

Hey, you think we’re all really going to make
it out of this alive?
What?

Listen, Takuma, are you okay? I don’t know
what to do in this kind of situation.
Miu and Saki both seem pretty nervous.
Don’t worry.
Don’t ask me!
We rely on each other.

I can understand why you’d be nervous, but
let’s all put our best feet forward here.

Remember our top priority right now is to
find Miyuki and Haru.
What? Don’t ask me! How should I know?

You’re right. You can’t have all the answers.
I’m sorry.

Oh, what is wrong with you? Are you good for
nothing? You’re supposed to be reassuring!
How am I supposed to be reassuring?

I can barely handle everything that’s going
on myself!

Besides, we should be focusing on finding
Haru and Miyuki right now.

Look, I may not have the answer, but we can
count on one another to come up with one.

They say two heads are better than one,
right?
I guess...

Everything’s going to be okay. As long as we
stick together, we’ll find a solution.
Sure.

Anyway, right now we should be focused on
catching up with Haru and Miyuki.

Ugh, this is the worst. I know Takuma’s
right, but I’m so scared I can hardly move.

Well, you don’t have to force yourself. Just
take your time, okay?
Right...

(I doubt my saying anything now would be much
help. What I need to do is believe in them.)
